name: Force Off
description:
Version 0.2.1

Force off, or be forced off!

A multiplayer mayhem where the players choose their characters and shoot others off the stage. Each character has a unique camera angle and gameplay mechanics, suited for players off different genre styles.

Be the last one standing!

Instructions

  • All characters: WASD to move; space to jump
  • First-Person Sniper: Hold Mouse1 to fire
  • Third-Person Shooter: R to reload, Shift to run
  • Top-Down Slugger: (bit bugged so special function not implemented yet :P)

Here's some visual instructions:

Got everything? Good luck!

Creator's Words

This is my first time working on a multiplayer game. It is a learning experience as well as an experimental platform to mess around with different mechanics. I also want players to have some fun and break everything while I add more interesting things. 

I'll try to balance it as much as possible so every character is equally fun, and I'll also try to make every character special in their own way and let player preference pick their favorite. 

No guarantee though.
